name: hardhat-project-with-deploy
description: Hardhat project with hardhat-deploy integration for contract management

scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/01_deploy_dependencies.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/02_deploy_mysmartcontract.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/01_deploy_dependencies.js --network goerli && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/02_deploy_mysmartcontract.js --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/01_deploy_dependencies.js --network mainnet && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/02_deploy_mysmartcontract.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:polygon: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/01_deploy_dependencies.js --network polygon && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/02_deploy_mysmartcontract.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/01_deploy_dependencies.js --network arbitrum && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/02_deploy_mysmartcontract.js --network arbitrum
scripts.deploy:info: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-info.js --network localhost -- list
scripts.deploy:report: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-info.js --network localhost -- report
scripts.deploy:export: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-info.js --network localhost -- export
scripts.deploy:help: echo 'Available commands: deploy:local, deploy:testnet, deploy:mainnet, deploy:polygon, deploy:arbitrum, deploy:all:*, deploy:info, deploy:report, deploy:export'

author: Hardhat Manager Skill
